emailFetch: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emailFetch (_id VARCHAR, _sfrom VARCHAR, sender_mail VARCHAR,date DATETIME,email_date DATETIME,subject VARCHAR,unread BOOLEAN,uid INTEGER,is_automatic_email_send INTEGER,default_tag VARCHAR,is_attachment BOOLEAN,attachment VARCHAR, tag_id VARCHAR)
tag_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Tag(id INTEGER,email VARCHAR(255),title VARCHAR(255),color VARCHAR(255),subject VARCHAR(255),type VARCHAR,is_job_profile_tag INTEGER,_to DATETIME,_from DATETIME,assign_to_all_emails INTEGER,template_id INTEGER,default_id INTEGER,is_email_send INTEGER,job_description VARCHAR(255),priority VARCHAR(255),parent_id INTEGER,keyword VARCHAR(255),createdAt DATETIME,updatedAt DATETIME )
